attachmentUnit.notReleasedTooltip: Only visible to teaching assistants and instructors. Release date:

createAttachmentUnit.title: Create Attachment Unit
createAttachmentUnit.name: Name
createAttachmentUnit.updateNotificationTextPlaceholder: Optional notification text for students about changes.
createAttachmentUnit.updateNotificationTextMaxLengthValidatio: The notification text can be max 255 characters long.
createAttachmentUnit.nameMaxLengthValidationError: Name can be max 255 characters long.
createAttachmentUnit.descriptionMaxLengthValidationError: Description can be max 255 characters long.
createAttachmentUnit.fileRequiredValidationError: You must select a file to upload.
createAttachmentUnit.fileLimitations: Supported Types: ".png", ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".svg", ".pdf", ".zip". Max. file size 10 mb

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the attachment unit {{ title }}? The attachment will also be removed! You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the attachment for confirmation.

createExerciseUnit.title: Exercise Unit
createExerciseUnit.headline: Connect an Exercise with the Lecture
createExerciseUnit.description: Select all the Exercises to connect with the Lecture.

delete.question: Do you really want to unlink the exercise {{ title }}? The exercise will be kept! You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the exercise for confirmation.
